name: GiveRecieveRepeat
description:
Give. Recieve. Repeat. is a puzzle platformer where you gift your controls to solve puzzles

Reach the exit of each level to move on to the next

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

Shift - Crouch

Space - Jump

F - Fireball

Page Up & Page Down - Moves forward and back through levels

Note: During the final rush trying to get everything pieced together in the game , some features were left out and some may have been neglected there appropriate attention as discovered in testing after submission (we definitely pushed it close to the limit with that one) the level transition through the goal doorways causes issues in later levels.  The levels can be played using the page up and down keys.  The last playable level is missing some elements required to complete it fully.

This is a proof of concept and as much as we were able to make in 48 hours so keep that in mind.
Enjoy!

@ubercubed_dev
